entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Webequie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:03 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -18.6°C

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 36. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 51 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
